openFinance.title: Open Finance
openFinance.subtitle: Connect banks and brokers to sync accounts and transactions

openFinance.noAccountsSynced: No accounts synced for this institution. Use Update to sync.

openFinance.itemIdError: Item ID not received from Pluggy.

toast.widgetInitError: Error initializing widget. Please try again.
toast.initConnectionError: Error initializing connection. Make sure the Pluggy widget is loaded.
